body: Have we verified that this change makes an actual difference outside the profiler? I ask because many profilers are known to suffer from safepoint bias. Reference: http://psy-lob-saw.blogspot.co.uk/2016/02/why-most-sampling-java-profilers-are.html

This is motivated from feedbacks of @norwood . Changes include:
1. Added INFO logging for rebalance and correlated tasks creations / closure / removal.
2. Added DEBUG logging for core procedures like offset commits, state manager flushing / closing, etc.
3. Bump some of DEBUG logging to INFO logging.
4. Added some TRACE logging for timestamp extraction, punctuation, etc.

@enothereska @dguy @mjsax for reviews.
